name: Eviction Defense Collaborative
description: EDC is a Direct Services Housing Justice Organization that works to prevent homelessness, preserve affordable housing, and protect the diversity of San Francisco. For legal assistance visit our drop in clinic: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday: 10-11:30am and 1-2:30pm Outside of these hours, please contact us by phone or email: -Legal Services -If you have received a Summons & Complaint or have been served a notice to quit, call the legal assistance line at: (415) 659-9184, or email us at: lega
